name: Caladrius Blaze
description: An epic tale that begins from shooting missiles! The newest work of the Caladrius series with lots of new features that exceeds the original story!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic card with 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.66GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic card with 1GB VRAM or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
